Trader of the Valley Kitzka:
Will of Antharas - stone, subordinate consciousness. Antaras created his, to command the most formidable monsters.
In addition, he gives the servants of Antaras unprecedented magical power. And in combination with Sealed Crystals Blood he is able to raise a lot of allies at the same time.
Sealed Blood Crystal can be gathered from Lord of the Drakes, Heads of Behimos and Monstrous Dragon.
